mapper.select:
SELECT oh.ID, ths.ANSWER_TOTAL, ths.APP_ANSWER, oh.VERSION, oh.DATA_DATE, oh.DATA_TYPE, oh.START_DATE, oh.END_DATE FROM OPERATE_HOTLINE oh LEFT JOIN TRAFFIC_HOTLINE_SUMMARY ths ON ths.DATA_TYPE=oh.DATA_TYPE AND ths.START_DATE=oh.START_DATE AND ths.END_DATE=oh.END_DATE AND ths.DATA_DATE=oh.DATA_DATE WHERE oh.DEL_FLAG='0'
AND oh.DATA_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')>=oh.DATA_DATE
ORDER BY oh.DATA_DATE desc
AND oh.START_DATE>=to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')>=oh.END_DATE
ORDER BY oh.START_DATE desc

SELECT oh.ID, ths.COMPLAINT_TOTAL, ths.PRAISE_TOTAL, ths.ANSWER_TOTAL, ths.APP_ANSWER, ths.CONSULT, ths.RESORT, ths.TYPE1_COMPLAINT, ths.TYPE2_COMPLAINT, ths.TYPE1_PRAISE, ths.TYPE2_PRAISE, ths.PENNANT, ths.S1_SWITCH, ths.OTHER, oh.VERSION, oh.DATA_DATE, oh.DATA_TYPE, oh.START_DATE, oh.END_DATE FROM OPERATE_HOTLINE oh LEFT JOIN TRAFFIC_HOTLINE_SUMMARY ths ON ths.DATA_TYPE=oh.DATA_TYPE AND ths.START_DATE=oh.START_DATE AND ths.END_DATE=oh.END_DATE AND ths.DATA_DATE=oh.DATA_DATE WHERE oh.DEL_FLAG='0' AND oh.ID=#{id}

SELECT oh.ID, thi.COUNT, thi.CONTENT, thi."RESULT", thi.KEYWORD, thi.HOTLINE_TYPE, oh.VERSION, oh.DATA_DATE, oh.DATA_TYPE, oh.START_DATE, oh.END_DATE FROM OPERATE_HOTLINE oh LEFT JOIN TRAFFIC_HOTLINE_IMPORTANT thi ON thi.DATA_TYPE=oh.DATA_TYPE AND thi.START_DATE=oh.START_DATE AND thi.END_DATE=oh.END_DATE AND thi.DATA_DATE=oh.DATA_DATE WHERE oh.DEL_FLAG='0' AND oh.ID=#{id} ORDER BY thi.HOTLINE_TYPE ASC
